Verses: 1 maruvarusham, Raajaakkal Yuththaththirkup Purappadum Kaalam Vandhapodhu, Yovaab Raanuvapalaththaik Koottikkondupoi, Ammon Puththirarindhesaththaip Paazhkkadiththu Rappaavukkuvandhu Adhai Mutrikkaipottaan; Dhaaveedho Erusalemil Irundhuvittaan; Yovaab Rappaavai Adiththu Sangariththaan.

2 dhaaveedhu Vandhu, Avargal Raajaavudaiya Thalaiyinmel Irundha Kireedaththai Eduththukkondaan; Adhu Oru Thaalandhu Niraiyum Raththinangal Padhiththadhumaayirundhadhu; Adhu Dhaaveedhinthalaiyil Vaikkappattadhu; Pattanaththilirundhu Eraalamaana Kollaiyaiyum Konduponaan.

3 pinbu Adhilirundha Janangalai Avan Veliye Kondupoi, Avargalai Vaalgalukkum, Iruppuppaaraigalukkum, Kodarigalukkum Utpaduththi; Ippadi Ammon Puththirarin Pattanangalukkellaam Dhaaveedhu Seydhu, Ellaa Janaththodunkooda Erusalemukkuth Thirumbinaan.

4 adharkuppinbu Keserile Pelistharodu Yuththam Undaayitru; Appozhudhu Oosaaththiyanaagiya Sipekkaai Raatchadha Puththiraril Oruvanaana Sippaayi Enbavanaik Kondraan; Adhinaal Avargal Vasappaduththappattaargal.

5 thirumbap Pelistharodu Yuththamundaagirapodhu, Yaaveerin Kumaaranaagiya Elkkaanaan Kaaththooraanaagiya Koliyaaththin Sagodharanaana Laagemiyaik Kondraan; Avan Eettith Thaangu Neygiravargalin Padaimaram Avvalavu Peridhaayirundhadhu.
6 marupadiyum Oru Yuththam Kaaththile Nadandhapodhu, Ange Nettaiyanaana Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avanukku Avvaaru Viralaaga Irubaththunaalu Viralgal Irundhadhu, Avanum Raatchadha Sandhadhiyaayirundhu,
7 isravelai Nindhiththaan; Dhaaveedhin Sagodharanaagiya Simeyaavin Kumaaran Yonaththaan Avanaik Kondraan.
8 kaaththoorilirundha Raatchadhanukkup Pirandha Ivargal Dhaaveedhin Kaiyinaalum Avan Sevagarin Kaiyinaalum Madindhaargal.
